title: Assassin & Betrayal
description: Two historical mysteries starring Lady Grace in one special volume!In the Edgar-nominated Assassin, o ne suitor is dead with a knife in his back and another is under suspicion. . . Can Lady Grace, Queen Elizabeth's favorite Maid of Honor, solve the mystery and bring order back to the Queen's court? And in Betrayal, life as a stowaway on board an Elizabethan galleon—it's no place for a lady! But when her fellow Maid of Honor disappears with a dashing sea captain, Lady Grace knows she just has to investigate.
author: Grace Cavendish
